form.name: Task Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose and requirements of the task (optional)

template.title: Synthesis Instruction Template
template.description: Select a template from the left, we will automatically fill in appropriate prompts and synthesis strategies for you.
template.searchPlaceholder: Search template name, e.g., SFT QA / COT Reasoning

sftQa.title: SFT QA Synthesis
sftQa.subtitle: Automatically generate high-quality Q&A pairs from long documents
sftQa.description: Suitable for building SFT Q&A datasets, supports extracting key Q&A pairs from knowledge bases or long documents.

cotReasoning.title: COT Chain of Thought Synthesis
cotReasoning.subtitle: Step-by-step reasoning process and final answer
cotReasoning.description: Generate COT data containing model reasoning intermediate process, used to improve model complex reasoning and explanation capabilities.

config.title: Synthesis Configuration
config.description: Configuration is automatically brought out according to the template on the left, you can also make fine adjustments on this basis.

totalLimit.title: Total synthesis limit
totalLimit.description: Control the maximum number of QA pairs generated for the entire task
totalLimit.placeholder: Optional, recommended to set upper limit for large-scale synthesis

slice.title: Text Slice Configuration
slice.description: Affects context length and recall granularity

question.title: Question Synthesis Configuration
question.description: Control the number and diversity of questions generated per chunk
question.countDesc: Number of questions generated per thousand tokens
question.promptDesc: Used to guide the model on how to generate high-quality questions from sliced text...
question.qaPlaceholder: Will pre-fill question generation Prompt based on SFT QA synthesis scenario, can be adjusted as needed
question.cotPlaceholder: Will pre-fill question generation Prompt based on COT reasoning synthesis scenario, can be adjusted as needed

answer.title: Answer Synthesis Configuration
answer.description: Control the stability and style of answer generation
answer.temperatureDesc: Lower value, more stable and conservative answers
answer.promptDesc: Used to constrain the style and content range of model answers, e.g., whether step-by-step reasoning is needed...
answer.qaPlaceholder: Will pre-fill answer generation Prompt based on SFT QA synthesis scenario, can be adjusted as needed
answer.cotPlaceholder: Will pre-fill answer generation Prompt based on COT reasoning synthesis scenario, can be adjusted as needed

hero.subtitle: AI Dataset Preparation Tool
hero.title: Building High-Quality AI Datasets
hero.description: From data management to knowledge generation, one-stop solution for enterprise AI data processing scenarios.

orchestrationHighlight.title: Data Orchestration - Visual Process Design
orchestrationHighlight.description: Drag-and-drop design of complex data processing pipelines, making data flow more intuitive and efficient.
orchestrationHighlight.smartFeature2: Smart error detection and repair suggestions

dataAgentHighlight.title: Data Agent - Conversational Business Operations
dataAgentHighlight.description: Say goodbye to complex interfaces, complete all dataset-related business operations with natural language.
dataAgentHighlight.example1: Help me create an image classification dataset
dataAgentHighlight.example2: Analyze data quality and generate a report
dataAgentHighlight.example3: Start synthesis task with target of 1000 data points
dataAgentHighlight.smartFeature1: Understand complex requirements and execute automatically
dataAgentHighlight.smartFeature2: Provide professional advice and optimization solutions
dataAgentHighlight.smartFeature3: Learn usage habits for personalized service

workflowShowcase.title: Complete Data Processing Workflow
workflowShowcase.description: End-to-end solution from raw data to high-quality datasets.
workflowShowcase.step1Description: Support importing from various data sources including local files, databases, APIs, etc.
workflowShowcase.step2Description: Visualize data processing workflows, automate complex tasks.
workflowShowcase.step3Description: Automated data processing, annotation, and quality assessment workflows.
workflowShowcase.step4Description: Comprehensive quality evaluation and bias detection to ensure dataset reliability.

orchestration.title: Smart Orchestration
orchestration.description: Visual data processing workflow orchestration, drag-and-drop design of complex data processing pipelines

chatAssistant.title: Chat Assistant
chatAssistant.description: Complete complex dataset operations and business processes through natural language conversation

evaluation.title: Comprehensive Evaluation
evaluation.description: Multi-dimensional data quality assessment, including statistical analysis, performance testing and bias detection

processing.title: Efficient Processing
processing.description: Complete data processing pipeline from raw data to usable datasets

knowledge.title: Knowledge Management
knowledge.description: Build RAG-oriented knowledge bases, supporting intelligent Q&A and retrieval
